title: How to Conserve Ammo in Resident Evil 0

steps.headline: Leeches are your weakest enemy, so don't kill them unless they form into a Leech Man.
steps.description: If a Leech Man is about to attack, evade it because its blows are very powerful.

steps.headline: Each character should have one or more full-healing items.
steps.description: However, Rebecca should have two full-healing items, because she takes on less damage than Billy.

steps.headline: The only enemies you should kill are the ones in thin, tight spaces, and the ones that run fast and are hard to evade like the Hunters and Monkeys.

Try to unlock new weapons and infinite ammo by first completing the game, then playing the leech hunter mini game.When you have about every thing you need in Leech Hunter, save Leech Hunter on any slot then load it so you will have all the things you unlocked on Leech Hunter
Enemies are most likely to appear after exiting a safe area.
To save Health put Rebecca in a safe area, then character switch to Billy and Solo Team.
If you have a limited amount of time to save Rebecca or Billy, never kill anything and find the fastest way to reach the other character.
steps.description: You cannot, however, character switch at this time.

steps.headline: Remember no one is keeping track of how many times you kill something, except in Resident Evil 4.

text: Leeches are your weakest enemy, so don't kill them unless they form into a Leech Man. If a Leech Man is about to attack, evade it because its blows are very powerful. Each character should have one or more full-healing items. However, Rebecca should have two full-healing items, because she takes on less damage than Billy. The only enemies you should kill are the ones in thin, tight spaces, and the ones that run fast and are hard to evade like the Hunters and Monkeys.  Try to unlock new weapons and infinite ammo by first completing the game, then playing the leech hunter mini game.When you have about every thing you need in Leech Hunter, save Leech Hunter on any slot then load it so you will have all the things you unlocked on Leech Hunter  Enemies are most likely to appear after exiting a safe area.  To save Health put Rebecca in a safe area, then character switch to Billy and Solo Team.  If you have a limited amount of time to save Rebecca or Billy, never kill anything and find the fastest way to reach the other character. You cannot, however, character switch at this time. Remember no one is keeping track of how many times you kill something, except in Resident Evil 4.
